name: Thundercall Hadrosaur
description: The Thundercall Hadrosaur is a massive dinosaur known for its thunderous bellow and powerful melee attacks, standing out with its impressive physical strength.
memorable: Its ability to unleash a powerful Thunderous Bellow can knock enemies prone and disrupt the battlefield.
goals: Typically aims to dominate its territory and use its powerful attacks in combat.
relations: May be related to other dinosaurs or large creatures in its habitat.
environment: Usually found in rugged terrain where it can utilize its size and power.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength allows it to overpower opponents and it deals double damage to structures as a Siege Monster.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it easier to hit with ranged attacks.
attacks: Can make three Slam attacks that deal significant bludgeoning damage and has a powerful area attack with Thunderous Bellow.
most_powerful_ability: Thunderous Bellow can damage multiple foes and knock them prone.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 15, allowing it to effectively notice threats.
skills: Proficient in perception, giving it a decent awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Has resistance to thunder damage and immunity to deafness.
Can use Sonic Shield to enhance its AC against ranged attacks.
Low Intelligence and Charisma, limiting its social interaction abilities.
Massive size lends itself to being a dominant presence in battle.
Notable ability to knock prone with its slam attacks.
test_queries: huge monster that can knock enemies prone
thundercall dinosaur with powerful melee attacks
dinosaur known for thunderous bellow attack
strong creature that dominates rugged terrain
